definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="stop_block_animation"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="block_animation"><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.iron_door.open</field><field name="soundcategory">block</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.4</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">35</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.iron_door.close</field><field name="soundcategory">block</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"></block></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"></block></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"></block></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.4</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
